body:
Features and Enhancements

Competitive Dashboard
    Note: This feature affects only projects with Confirmed Practicing data.
  • Added ability to toggle what records are used in the analysis and displayed in the results.
    • Directory: Analysis displays all records within the project.
      • NOTE: The term Directory refers to all records in the project.
    • Confirmed: Analysis displays only confirmed records within the project.
    • Side-by-side: Analysis displays both Directory and Confirmed records.
  • Updated Competitive Dashboard CSV exports to reflect the selected records to show.
    • If Show Directory is selected, exports will include all counts.
    • If Show Confirmed is selected, exports will include only Confirmed counts.
    • If Show Side-by-side is selected, exports will include both Directory and Confirmed counts.
